job_description:
Hi ,
Hope you are doing great!!

Please let me know your interests for below position.

Position : Angular Developer;
Location : Montreal, QC, Canada;
Type : Full Time / Contract


Basic Qualifications
-7+ years of experience in development of high-quality java solutions
-Strong analytical and problem-solving ability
-You are a self-motivated individual contributor and great teammate with the ability to multitask, prioritize and communicate progress in a rapidly changing environment.
-Experience with design and build of high performance, low latency distributed systems
-Experience in solution architecture for identifying and evaluating the capabilities of Azure to support the cloud transformation journey
-Experience working with Kafka messaging and MongoDB is a big plus
-Experience with SQL
-UNIX/Linux experience
Desired Qualifications
-MongoDB experience is an asset
-Angular 2+ is an asset


Thanks & Regards
Avinash Kumar
